時刻到来: (じこくとうらい) - (yoji) The time has come (for, to, when...); Now is the time
時刻表: (じこくひょう) - table; diagram; chart; timetable; schedule
時効: (じこう) - statute of limitations/lapse of rights after a period of time/prescription (including acquisitive and extinctive prescription); ageing/aging
時効取得: (じこうしゅとく) - usucaption; acquisitive prescription; positive prescription
時効期間: (じこうきかん) - {law} period of prescription; period of statute of limitations
時勢: (じせい) - spirit of the age; trends; conditions
時勢に伴って: (じせいにともなって) - in step with the times
時勢感覚: (じせいかんかく) - (yoji)  sense of the trend of the times; sensitivity to the changing times
時化: (しけ) - (ant: 凪) stormy weather (at sea); poor catch of fish (due to stormy seas); poor turn-out/recession
時化る: (しける) - to be stormy or choppy (sea); to go through hard times/to be broke; to be gloomy/to be glum
時圏: (じけん) - {astron} hour circle; circle of declination
時報: (じほう) - announcement of time/time signal; news report/newsletter
時宜: (じぎ) - right time; appropriate time; season's greetings
時宜によって: (じぎによって) - depending on circumstances
時宜を得る: (じぎをえる) - (often used prenominally as 時宜を得た) to be well-timed; to be timely; to be opportune
時局: (じきょく) - situation; state of things; current affairs
時局柄: (じきょくがら) - in view of the present situation
時差出勤: (じさしゅっきん) - (yoji) staggered work hours
時時刻刻: (じじこくこく) - (yoji) hourly; from one minute to the next; from hour to hour; moment by moment; with each passing moment
時期が早い: (じきがはやい) - before scheduled; earlier than expected
時期に差しかける: (じきにさしかける) - to get close to the time
時期に差し掛ける: (じきにさしかける) - to get close to the time
時期早々: (じきそうそう) - (incorrect variant of 時期尚早)  premature
時期早尚: (じきそうしょう) - (incorrect variant of 時期尚早)  premature
時期早早: (じきそうそう) - (incorrect variant of 時期尚早)  premature
時機到来: (じきとうらい) - (yoji) a good chance coming along; the time has come (for, to, when...); opportunity knocking
時流: (じりゅう) - fashion (current) of the times; general drift of affairs
時流に乗って泳ぐ: (じりゅうにのっておよぐ) - to swim with the current
時祷書: (じとうしょ) - book of hours (devotional book popular in the Middle Ages)
時空間情報科学: (じくうかんじょうほうかがく) - spatio-temporal information science; time-space information science
時節到来: (じせつとうらい) - (yoji) The time has come (for, to, when...); The time being ripe (for)
時節柄: (じせつがら) - in these times; in times like these; the season being what it is
時節柄の贈り物: (じせつがらのおくりもの) - seasonable gift
時系列: (じけいれつ) - chronological order; time series
時系列分析: (じけいれつぶんせき) - time series analysis
時給: (じきゅう) - hourly pay; hourly wage
時艱: (じかん) - problems that affect a period of time; hardships peculiar to an age; hard problems of the times
時衆: (じしゅう) - assembly of monks and laity (at a rite, sermon, etc.); (monks and laity of) the Jishu sect
時計信管: (とけいしんかん) - time fuse (often used to detonate high explosives)
時計回り: (とけいまわり) - (ant: 反時計回り) clockwise rotation; CW
時計屋: (とけいや) - watch store; watch dealer
時計座: (とけいざ) - {astron} Horologium (constellation); the Pendulum Clock
時計草: (トケイソウ) - blue passion flower (Passiflora caerulea)
時評: (じひょう) - commentary on current events
時論: (じろん) - comments on current events; public sentiments of the day; current view; contemporary opinion
時起こる: (ときおこる) - at the time of occurrence; occurring at the time
時輪金剛: (じりんこんごう) - Kalacakra; Wheel of Time (tantric Buddhist deity)
時間: (jikan) - tempo; hora, tempo; hora; período, aula, lição
時間がかかる: (じかんがかかる) - to take time
時間が掛かる: (じかんがかかる) - to take time
時間が空く: (じかんがあく) - to have time free; to have time to spare
